document.full_text: afghan president hamid karzai has ordered the defense ministry to take control of night raids, one of the most controversial tactics used by foreign troops fighting the taliban, in a move likely to stoke tensions between kabul and its western backers.
document.title: karzai wants afghans to take control of night raids
